name: Blunderbuss (Steven Miller)
description:
Created by Steven Miller for Ludum Dare #36: Ancient Technology

It is the 18th century. Embark on an adventure to overthrow the corrupt monarch with only your trusty blunderbuss. Tolerate horrible accuracy and long reload times as you fight your way to King Perfidious.

Features:

Riveting dialogue

20 levels of action and excitement

Smoke effects

Boss fights

4 enemy types

----Operator Update----
Play by downloading Blunderbuss Operator, an update featuring new and modified levels, new dialogue, and even more excitement, all made in a little over 2 hours!

Warning! Contains spoilers for the first game.
